remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  Use ~ reuhypd to eliminate the second hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.)
statement:
reuxfrd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B ) -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfrd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> E! y e. B x = A ) $.
reuxfrd.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
reuxfrd $p |- ( ph -> ( E! x e. B ps <-> E! y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
